com.k2.Util.tuple

Class TupleUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.tuple.TupleUtil

  • public class TupleUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static utility methods for creating and dealing with Tuples and the concrete implementations of the Tuple interface
    Author:
    simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TupleUtil()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.persistence.Tuple aliasedTuple(java.lang.String[] aliases, java.lang.Object... values)
      This static method creates an instance of Tuple with the given values aliased by the given array of aliases
      static javax.persistence.Tuple tuple(java.lang.Object... values)
      This static method creates an instance of Tuple with the given values aliased by the aliases "a", "b", "c" etc.
      static <T> javax.persistence.TupleElement<T> tupleElement(java.lang.Class<? extends T> cls)
      This static method creates an instance of TupleElement for the given class only.
      static <T> javax.persistence.TupleElement<T> tupleElement(java.lang.String alias, java.lang.Class<? extends T> cls)
      This static method creates an instance of TupleElement for the given alias and class

    • Method Detail

      • aliasedTuple

        public static javax.persistence.Tuple aliasedTuple(java.lang.String[] aliases,
                                                   java.lang.Object... values)
        This static method creates an instance of Tuple with the given values aliased by the given array of aliases
        Parameters:
        aliases - The aliases to use for members of the Tuple
        values - The values to set as members of the Tuple
        Returns:
        The Tuple implementation for the given values identified by the given aliases

      • tuple

        public static javax.persistence.Tuple tuple(java.lang.Object... values)
        This static method creates an instance of Tuple with the given values aliased by the aliases "a", "b", "c" etc.
        Parameters:
        values - The values to set as members of the Tuple
        Returns:
        The Tuple implementation for the given values

      • tupleElement

        public static <T> javax.persistence.TupleElement<T> tupleElement(java.lang.String alias,
                                                                 java.lang.Class<? extends T> cls)
        This static method creates an instance of TupleElement for the given alias and class
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the member of the Tuple referenced by this TupleElement
        Parameters:
        alias - The alias of the TupleElement
        cls - The class of the TupleElement
        Returns:
        The TupleElement for the given alias and Element

      • tupleElement

        public static <T> javax.persistence.TupleElement<T> tupleElement(java.lang.Class<? extends T> cls)
        This static method creates an instance of TupleElement for the given class only. Such TupleElements will match the first member of the given class
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the member of the Tuple referenced by this TupleElement
        Parameters:
        cls - The class of the TupleElement
        Returns:
        The TupleElement for the given class
